review: ***** ** *** *** ** *** ****** ****** Practical and sensitive approach towards her patients. My entire pregnancy from Day 1 till i came home was so smooth. And i give my due credits to Dr Dhwaraga. She not only reads her patients body language but also mind. She keeps you calm and also helps handle the new situations as pregnant lady and as new mother. **** ******* * **** **** ******* I feel lucky to have met her in my most crucial stage of life. I highly recommend her.

I had irregular periods and some other issues and consulted to her. She asked for some tests and all and revisited her again. She explained to me everything in detail and the best part about her is that she gives so much time to each patient and empathetic enough to make it feel more personal than being a doctor. Whatever she asked me to do, I have been following it and I can see the difference in myself. **** ************* *** expert in her domain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very friendly doctor and most important she gave good time for me and explained everything clearly.
